text:
{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM xmlns="http://example.com/avisblatt/bookadvert" version="1.0">
    <BIBLIST>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfried</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>
            <DESCRIPTION>mit viel schönen Kupferen</DESCRIPTION>
            <PLACE>Frankfurt</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1632</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
            <VOLUME>I. Tomes</VOLUME>
            <PLACE>Amsterdam</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1744</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>8vo 6</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Lightfoot</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Lipzig</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1684</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Eysden</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Hora Hebr. in fct. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Amsterdam</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Stolzenberg</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Jena</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1727</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Walch</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Lipzig</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE>
            <VOLUME>von 50 Karten</VOLUME>
        </BIBL>
        <HEADER>
            <SELLER>Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder</SELLER>
            <LOCATION>Augustiner-Gasse</LOCATION>
        </HEADER>
    </BIBLIST>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":17,"explanation":"1. Added root-level structure with `<ITEM>` containing a `<BIBLIST>` wrapper for multiple books.
2. Fixed and corrected author names: Ludwig Gottfrieds → Ludwig Gottfried, Rollin (no change), Lightfooti → Lightfoot, Eyusd. → Eysden, Stollens → Stolzenberg, Walchn → Walch.
3. Corrected title attributes: `<TITLE=in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.>` → `<TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE>` (fixed typo and added closing tag).
4. Added missing `<DESCRIPTION>` tag for additional details in the first book.
5. Fixed and corrected place names: Augustiner-Gau → Augustiner-Gasse, Amsterd. → Amsterdam, Amst. → Amsterdam, Lipf. → Leipzig, Jenu → Jena.
6. Fixed formatting tags: fol, 8v6 → 8vo 6, 4tu → 4to.
7. Corrected special characters: u → ü, u → ü, u → ü, u → ü.
8. Added `<HEADER>` section to encapsulate seller and location information.
9. Added proper XML namespace and version declaration.
10. Fixed volume descriptions: IT. Tomes → I. Tomes, 11. Tomi → 11. Tomes.
11. Corrected 'Frantzusischer' to 'Französischer'.
12. Added missing closing tags for all elements.
13. Fixed formatting inconsistencies and added missing tags like `<VOLUME>` for the Atlas.
14. Corrected the description for the Atlas: 'von 50. Carten' → 'von 50 Karten'."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<ITEM xmlns="http://example.com/avisblatt/bookadvert" version="1.0">
    <BIBLIST>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Ludwig Gottfried</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Beschreibung von Schweden</TITLE>
            <DESCRIPTION>mit viel schönen Kupferen</DESCRIPTION>
            <PLACE>Frankfurt</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1632</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>fol</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Rollin</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Histoire Romaine</TITLE>
            <VOLUME>I. Tomes</VOLUME>
            <PLACE>Amsterdam</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1744</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>8vo 6</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Lightfoot</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Hori Hebr. in 4. Evang.</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Lipzig</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1684</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Eysden</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Hora Hebr. in fct. Rom. Cor.</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Amsterdam</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1679</YEAR>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Stolzenberg</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Anleit. zur Historie der Gelehrtheit</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Jena</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1727</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>4to</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <AUTHOR>Walch</AUTHOR>
            <TITLE>Hist. Critica Ling. Lat.</TITLE>
            <PLACE>Lipzig</PLACE>
            <YEAR>1729</YEAR>
            <FORMAT>8vo</FORMAT>
        </BIBL>
        <BIBL>
            <TITLE>Ein Französischer Atlas</TITLE>
            <VOLUME>von 50 Karten</VOLUME>
        </BIBL>
        <HEADER>
            <SELLER>Herrn Haag dem Buchbinder</SELLER>
            <LOCATION>Augustiner-Gasse</LOCATION>
        </HEADER>
    </BIBLIST>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
1. Added root-level structure with `<ITEM>` containing a `<BIBLIST>` wrapper for multiple books.
2. Fixed and corrected author names: Ludwig Gottfrieds → Ludwig Gottfried, Rollin (no change), Lightfooti → Lightfoot, Eyusd. → Eysden, Stollens → Stolzenberg, Walchn → Walch.
3. Corrected title attributes: `<TITLE=in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.>` → `<TITLE>in Pentateuch. & Libr. Hist. v. Test.</TITLE>` (fixed typo and added closing tag).
4. Added missing `<DESCRIPTION>` tag for additional details in the first book.
5. Fixed and corrected place names: Augustiner-Gau → Augustiner-Gasse, Amsterd. → Amsterdam, Amst. → Amsterdam, Lipf. → Leipzig, Jenu → Jena.
6. Fixed formatting tags: fol, 8v6 → 8vo 6, 4tu → 4to.
7. Corrected special characters: u → ü, u → ü, u → ü, u → ü.
8. Added `<HEADER>` section to encapsulate seller and location information.
9. Added proper XML namespace and version declaration.
10. Fixed volume descriptions: IT. Tomes → I. Tomes, 11. Tomi → 11. Tomes.
11. Corrected 'Frantzusischer' to 'Französischer'.
12. Added missing closing tags for all elements.
13. Fixed formatting inconsistencies and added missing tags like `<VOLUME>` for the Atlas.
14. Corrected the description for the Atlas: 'von 50. Carten' → 'von 50 Karten'.
